content: Instead, take the path to the left. You'll see a set of stares with the Flame Rhino Master at the top, and a small temple with a flame glowing inside. Head for the stairs first and take out the Flame Rhino Master, then hop over to the temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Instead, take the path to the left. You'll see a set of stares with the Flame Rhino Master at the top, and a small temple with a flame glowing inside. Head for the stairs first and take out the Flame Rhino Master, then hop over to the temple.
